links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = 12 + 6*(-1)^n - 9*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 10 2009
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 42000); x=contfrac(sqrt(84)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040074.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 10 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010535 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 10 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
